detail_desc: Rain coat in water-repellent functional fabric with a drawstring hood, press-studs down the front and side pockets. Long raglan sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs. Unlined. The coat can be folded and packed easily into its storage bag which has an elasticated drawstring at the top. Size of bag 9x21 cm. The coat has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Set with a pair of joggers and a top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated, ribbed waistband, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Fully lined bikini top with decorative gathers at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in various ways. Metal fastener at the back.
Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll-edge ribbing around the opening and cuffs. No buttons.
Knee-length tunic in a silk and modal weave with a small stand-up collar, buttons at the front and yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Calf-length culottes woven in a linen blend with a high paper bag waist, adjustable belt and pleats at the front. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Off-the-shoulder top in a woven cotton blend. Elastication around the top and short sleeves with a tie at the cuffs.
Leather sandals with crossover straps at the front, padded leather insoles and rubber soles.
Nightslip in woven fabric with a lace trim at the top, V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey with a racer back.
Ankle boots with a loop at the back. Heel 4 cm.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with decorative V-shaped seams at the top. Slightly looser fit with an extra high waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft and zip in one side. Soft pile linings and insoles. Heel 2 cm.

Cotton canvas espadrilles with a small platform, decorative metal buckle at the front and braided jute trim around the soles. Imitation leather trim and loop. Canvas linings and insoles. Platform 3 cm.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.
Top in an airy, fine knit with short sleeves with decorative seams, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short, wide, sports top in printed, fast-drying mesh layered over a vest top with a racer back.
Short dress in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Sewn-on tie belt at the waist, flap chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidered detail on the chest and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour in the inside of the collar and cuffs.

Short dress in patterned viscose jersey with a V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover and frill trim at the top. Short sleeves, a seam with a drawstring at the waist and a double layered skirt with a frill trim. Unlined.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Thin tights with an elasticated waist.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Sleeveless, V-neck blouse in woven fabric with a wrapover front, pleats at the shoulders, pleat at the back and narrow elastication at the hem. Concealed press-stud at the front and a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Lightweight, unlined sports socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed shaft.
Calf-length skirt in soft, gently draping silk with a sheen. Oblique seam and a slit at the front and a gentle flare to the hem. Lined at the top.
Sports top in sturdy, fast-drying functional fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, decorative seams and long raglan sleeves.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a wide lace trim at the front and high cut at the back.
Joggers in washed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with decorative stitching at the knees and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved romper suit in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with buttons down the front and concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.
Metal rings in various designs that come in a gift box with a transparent lid and a satin ribbon at the top.
Thin metal-chain anklets with decorations. Adjustable length.
Short, fitted lace skirt with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back, and a scalloped hem. Lined.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and straight, wide legs with creases.
Thong briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with a mid waist and lined gusset.
V-neck body in ribbed jersey with narrow tie-top shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
High-waisted shorts in cotton twill with a detachable tie belt, zip fly and button, patch front pockets and open back pockets.

Boiler suit in washed cotton twill with a V-neck, notch lapels, buttons down the front and 3/4-length sleeves . Flap chest pockets, patch front pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist and straight, ankle-length legs with elasticated hems.
Glass water bottle with a patterned silicone grip cover, metal screw top and practical wrist strap at the top. Diameter 6.5 cm, height 21 cm.

Calf-length kaftan woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a V-neck and concealed buttons down the front. Double-layered yoke that continues down the sleeves, pleats at the front and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

prod_name: Petite Perrie slim mom denim T
detail_desc: 5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a high waist, button fly and gently tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Oversized top in a fine-knit viscose blend with a wide, rib-trimmed neckline. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with ribbed trims and a rounded, rib-trimmed hem. Slightly longer at the back.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Double-breasted jacket in soft, patterned viscose twill with peak lapels with decorative buttonholes. Chest pocket, flap front pockets, an inner pocket, buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Pyjamas in patterned cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a round neck. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide, gently tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Washed cotton twill trousers in a regular fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a gently rounded hem.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Scarf in patterned satin.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fitted top in organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck with a lace trim.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with an adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front. Loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.

Sports bandeau top in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric. Lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and detachable, adjustable shoulder straps. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Metal rings in various designs with faceted sparkly stones.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a funnel collar with a wrapover front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short-sleeved top in an airy cotton weave with textured stripes and a round neckline with gathers at the front and concealed press-studs at the back. Wrapover back with an open section and wide ties at the hem.
Longer shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a small text print, an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Shorts in an airy weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, wrapover legs and lace trims.
Hooded jacket in soft pile with a small fabric appliqué on the front, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbed cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Satin tie. Width 6.5 cm.

Running trousers in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Mesh-lined side pockets, a concealed key pocket in the waistband, a zip at the hems, and reflective details. Regular fit.
Wide trousers in a striped weave with a high waist, wide belt loops and a rope-look belt. Concealed zip and button at one side and wide, straight legs.
Wide, cropped T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim legs.
Trousers in cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, fake welt pockets at the back and straight, wide legs with creases.
Short, fine-knit dress with a hood, waterfall neckline and long sleeves. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and slim, tapered legs.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Calf-length dress in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and a wrapover skirt. Unlined.
Soft, non-wired bras in microfibre with a lace racer back. Lightly padded cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and side support. No fasteners.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish and a detachable, faux shearling-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front, a drawstring at the waist and flap side pockets with a press-stud. Inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined in faux shearling lining at the top and a diamond-quilted weave below.
Round-necked T-shirt in heavy cotton jersey with a print motif. Relaxed fit with a narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline.
Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and raw-edge hems.
